title: Magnificent Floral Diamond Haaram with Matching Jhumka Set - A Timeless Treasure
materials: Crafted in high-purity 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Adorned with dazzling
interspersed with Emeralds and Rubies. Features lustrous South Sea Pearls. Gold Mesh chain.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases intricate floral motifs, a quintessential design element in South Indian jewelry. Delicate Diamond-studded peacock motifs, a symbol of beauty and prosperity (Subham), enhance the neckline. The matching Jhumka earrings mirror the necklace's floral pattern, creating a cohesive and elegant set. The setting showcases expert craftsmanship with a fine, secure hold. Floral pendant with Pearl drops.
colors: Predominantly brilliant White (Diamonds) with rich Gold accents. Subtle touches of Emerald Green and Ruby Red for a vibrant
traditional color palette. The Pearls add a soft
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivaha)
and other celebratory events. Its timeless design also makes it suitable for cultural performances and formal gatherings.
description: This Diamond Haaram set is a true investment, blending traditional South Indian artistry with contemporary design sensibilities. Its impeccable craftsmanship, high-quality materials, and cultural significance make it a cherished heirloom piece, perfect for passing down through generations. The brilliance of the diamonds, combined with the richness of the gold and the elegance of the pearls, creates a stunning visual impact. Own a piece of Hyderabad's rich jewelry heritage.
